p: hackajob has partnered with a leading provider of data, technologies, and insights that enable financial institutions to make better, and more profitable, data-driven decisions faster. In this role, you will draw insights from massive datasets, create intuitive data visualizations, and build scalable machine-learning models and products. You will also work with experts in data engineering, machine learning, and business executives to deliver proactive instead of reactive solutions.

li: Bachelor's/Master=E2=80=99s degree in Mathematics, Statistics, a relevant technical field, or equivalent practical experience
li.1: A minimum of 4 years of work experience in data science
li.2: Heavy experience in writing and optimizing SQL queries in a business environment with large-scale, complex datasets
li.3: High coding proficiency in scripting languages (e.g., Python)
li.4: Experience applying various machine learning techniques, and understanding the key parameters that affect their performance
li.5: Experience using notebook solutions such as Jupyter to conduct reproducible data analysis and modeling projects
li.6: Familiarity with at least one cloud-based platform (Google Cloud Platform, Amazon Web Services, or Microsoft Azure)

p.8: Offer: basic salary up to $200K + benefits package
p.10: If you're interested in finding out more about this fantastic opportunity, please get your application in and we can arrange a call.
